Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class GUIController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.GUIController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewController
public class GUIController extends Object implements ViewController
extends the ViewController class, implementing methods to control the GUI
